Package com.g1.mychess.player.repository

Interface PlayerRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Player,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Player,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Player,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Player,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Player,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Player>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Player,Long>
@Repository public interface PlayerRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Player,Long>
Repository interface for managing Player entities. Provides methods to query and interact with player data in the database.

    • findByUsernameContainingIgnoreCase

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Player> findByUsernameContainingIgnoreCase(String query, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Finds players whose username contains the provided query string (case-insensitive). This is useful for search functionality.
      Parameters:
      query - the search query to match against usernames.
      pageable - the pagination information.
      Returns:
      a Page of Player entities matching the search query.
